actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Library Services and Construction Act to provide for a program of Federal aid to large urban public libraries.

summary.text: Amends the Library Services and Construction Act to provide for a program of grants to the States to be used by public libraries serving cities with a population of more than 100,000 for the purpose of purchasing books and other library materials.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Library Services and Construction Act to provide for a program of Federal aid to large urban public libraries.
